title: Taken Without Her Consent
description: As the young barista repeats the incoming coffee requests and rings in the order, she has no idea that she will soon find herself waking up in a bed far from home, with no memory of how she got there. When she opens her eyes she finds the handsome customer she had flirted with sitting at her bedside and discovers that her whole world has been stolen by this dangerously obsessive man. As Savannahâ€™s life is thrown into his dangerous and chaotic world she is consumed by the erotic pleasures he introduces her to, and eventually finds herself clinging to the very person she should despise.
author: Mitzi D. Lane
